email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for this route. She’s a 150,000 DWT tanker with an LOA of 280 meters. The laycan is 15-20 October. I can offer a starting freight rate in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Would you consider coming down to the mid-40s? Also, can you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your position, but the mid-40s is a bit tight given current market conditions. I can offer $49.50 per metric ton as a compromise. Laytime is 72 hours, and demurrage is set at $20,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. $49.50 is closer to our target. Can we agree on $48.75? Also, can we extend the laytime to 96 hours? The demurrage rate is acceptable. Let me know if we can finalize this. Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I appreciate your flexibility. I can agree to $48.75 per metric ton and extend the laytime to 96 hours. Let’s proceed with these terms. I’ll draft the charter party agreement and send it over for your review. Thanks for your cooperation. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, that sounds good. Please send over the charter party agreement, and we’ll review it promptly. Looking forward to finalizing this shipment. Cheers, John.
